item.title: Blender Course
item.description: Blender Course for UVU This course is being developed by Clayton Lantz and Ben Shurts at Utah Valley University. This website and course is being planned and created using Obsidian, A tool for creating knowledge networks, taking notes, and doing all sorts of productivity tasks.
